text: Diego de Paz Pazo (born September 25, 1971 in Sevilla) is a wheelchair basketball athlete from Spain. He has a physical disability: he is 4 point wheelchair basketball player. He played wheelchair basketball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. They beat the United States 66-60 to finish third. He played wheelchair basketball at the 2012 Summer Paralympics. His team was fifth. They beat Germany 67-48 to finish fifth. == References == Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Spanish wheelchair basketball players Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:4 point player Category:People from Seville
title: Diego De Paz Pazo
